section.title: Description
section.p: This class includes data elements related to person eligibility and other administrative information that is evaluated at the time of discharge from the Home Based Primary Care (HBPC) Program.

stentry.p: The date the patient was discharged from the HBPC Program.

Describes the status of the patient at discharge. Possible Values are Transferred to Other Provider; Anticipated Institutionalization; Family or Self Care/No Regular Source; Died on HBPC; Moved Away/Lost to Contact; Not Determined etc.

The patient's eligibility at time of evaluation for HBPC program. Possible Values Include: Service Connected 50% or More; Aid &amp; Attendance or Housebound; Service Connected Less Than 50%; Non-Service Connected, Receiving VA Pension; Other Non-Service Connected etc..
Living arrangement of a patient for HBPC Program. Possible Values Include: Alone; With Spouse; With Relatives; With Non-Relatives; Group Quarters, Not Health Related; Not Determined etc.
Marital Status of the patient at time of admission to the HBPC Program.
Represents the patient's type of destination agency.
Patient's Health Assessment at time of discharge from HBPC Program.
